title: Additional financial support for people in precarious situations
title_national_language: Aanvullende financiële ondersteuning voor mensen in precaire situatie
status_of_regulation: New aspects included into existing measure
subcategory: Protection of vulnerable groups (beyond employment support)
background_info_description: During the federal Super-Core (temporary government) of 6 June 2020, a number of important measures were taken to support the social service providers and their clients.Concretely, living wage recipients (social assistance), persons with disabilities and people with a guaranteed income for the elderly will receive €50 on top of their benefit for a total of six months. The costs of this will be borne entirely by the federal authorities. In addition, subsidies for food aid will be increased by a further €3 million. For new living wage (social assistance) dossiers, the social services will receive an additional subsidy of 15% on the amount paid out in the period from June to December.
content_of_measure_description: **Additional premium for those receiving social assistance benefits:**Anyone who receives social assistance benefit - such as a living wage, an allowance for the disabled, or an income guarantee for the elderly - receives an additional premium of €50 each month from July to December 2020. In addition, further €100 million are made available to the social services to provide allowances in the event of rent payment problems, or school and energy costs.**Increased sickness benefit:**For sick days, from 1st March to 31st August 2020, the sickness benefit will be increased, unless the illness started before the 1st of March or is covered by the guaranteed salary.
use_of_measure_description: No data on uptake of the measure available.
involvement_of_social_partners_descripti: No data are available about the concrete involvement of social partners.

Als u akkoord gaat met het gebruik van cookies, geldt dit voor de volgende websites: https://www.hetacv.be EN https://auth.acv-csc.be.                                                                    Functionele cookies (altijd actief)                                            Altijd                                            Functionele cookies zijn essentieel voor de goede werking van onze websites en voor een optimaal en veilig gebruik. Door die cookies kunnen bijvoorbeeld keuzes en selecties uit je vorige bezoeken bewaard worden om je zo sneller aan te melden of een formulier in te vullen. Die cookies kunnen ingesteld worden zonder je toelating. Sommige van die cookies worden pas geactiveerd nadat hiervoor gekozen wordt.                                                                    Analytische cookies                                                                                                                 De analytische cookies verzamelen informatie over de manier waarop onze websites gebruikt worden, waarmee we onze sites kunnen verbeteren en gebruiksvriendelijker maken.                                                                    Marketingcookies                                                                                                                 Met marketingcookies kunnen we je gepersonaliseerde content en reclame aanbieden over andere websites en/of sociale media, in functie van je interesses. Met deze cookies kan onze content ook gedeeld worden op sociale media of kunnen filmpjes op onze website getoond worden. Deze cookies worden in de meeste gevallen ingesteld door derden, gelinkt aan sociale media (Facebook, YouTube, Twitter, LinkedIn).
